@tseccv right-click on my computer then properties.... go to the hardware tab and click divice maneger.... the drivers that are not installed will have something next to it.... btw if anyone else is reading thins DO NOT update just yet.. get driver genuises professional pro and back up all your drivers.... look it up on youtube...
